input: Execute a batch request to retrieve contracts with details for party IDs 678901 and 512345, including card type and validity.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '678901'&$select=PaymentCardTypeName,PaymentCardValidFrom,PaymentCardValidTo HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '512345'&$select=PaymentCardTypeName,PaymentCardValidFrom,PaymentCardValidTo HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
